extendedInfo.description: THIS WILL ONLY WORK ON THE DELL STREAK!!!(or any other phone that has 3 independent LEDs at the bottom) ****** ROOT ACCESS AND CUSTOM FIRMWARE ARE VITAL! APP WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT IT! ******This is the free, ad-supported version of my StreakLED Application with full functionality. If you like it, please consider purchasing the paid version to remove the ads for Â£1.50. Thanks.(If you are using ad-blockers/modified Hosts file this app will NOT OPEN. I stand by this decision and will not be removing the block. If you are not happy with this, either disable the ad blocker while you run it or purchase the full version. You can also just remove all traces of "admob" from your hosts file if you wish)Please be aware this is still in Beta and is still under development.Confirmed Working on StreakDroidv1.8.0This app will now act upon Gmails as well as Text (SMS) messages!An SMS will light up the 'home' LED whilst a Gmail will light up the 'Menu' LED.Works with all lockscreen replacement apps. SMSpopup compatibility is being worked on.

reviews.title: Too loyal to ads
reviews.comment: I used to use this all the time, but now requires it\'s ads to be unblocked. I\'d rather block ads than use the ap. Works well otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Read carefully
reviews.comment: To have this working, a superuser (rooted) phone with a custom Android ROM needs to be installed. Works beautifully.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app works well. Be even better if leds could be used for battery charging indectors. facebook notification.

reviews.comment: Great app. Would have given five stars if it had more functions, such as l.e.d. For missed calls etc. waiting to donate if this gets more functinal
